mn54:2.3: ajjhogāhetvā → ajjhogahetvā (bj, sya-all, km); ajjhogāhitvā (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
mn54:3.14: Evaṃ kho me → evañca me (sya-all); evaṃ me (mr)
mn54:6.4: Ahañceva → ahañce (?) | anuviccāpi maṃ viññū → anuvicca viññū (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn54:15.2: upasumbheyya → upacchubheyya (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); upacchūbheyya (sya-all, km); upaccumbheyya (mr)
mn54:17.3: daheyya aññataraṃ vā aññataraṃ vā aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ → daheyya. aññataraṃ vā aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); ḍaheyya … (sya-all)
mn54:20.1: yānaṃ vā → yānaṃ (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed) | poriseyyaṃ → poroseyyaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr); oropeyya (sya-all, km)
mn54:21.18: amuko yo → asu yo (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); amuko (sya-all)
